Hi Radioman,

In the constructor of winforms demo you are using below line of code to get the Lat and long.

PointLatLng? pos = GMapProviders.GoogleMap.GetPoint("Lithuania, Vilnius", out status);

Now my question is that I am planning to use CloudeMade apis for my application as it looks like they are less pricy than google and bing, can you suggest me how can I get pointLatLong if I set the GMapProvers.CloudMade. I tried the code but looks like there is no Method like GetPoint which will give the PointLongLat.

 

Can you also share you thoughts the cloudMade apis are fully supported by GMAP or I need to add something.

 

Thanks for your time.
cloudMade provider now has only RoutingProvider, DirectionsProvider, no geocoder
ha ha ha no worries Radiaoman. I will give it a short and will try to implement it otherwise you have to jumpin to save me
